typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_key_clm as string,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		inserted_by as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		clm_code as string,
		clm_source_system as string,
		clm_description as string,
		clm_source_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_prepare.pre_dim_claim_type',
	format: 'query') ~> PreDimClmType
PreDimClmType select(mapColumn(
		pk_key_clm,
		clm_code,
		clm_source_system,
		clm_description,
		clm_source_key
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PreDimClmTypeslected
PreDimClmTypeslected aggregate(groupBy(pk_key_clm),
	each(match(name!='pk_key_clm'), $$ = first($$))) ~> Deduplicate
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
Deduplicate derive(Top_key = 'ALL',
		Top_description = 'All Claim Types') ~> DerivedColumn1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		dimension_key as long,
		clm_key as string,
		top_id as long,
		clm_code as string,
		clm_source_key as string,
		clm_id as long,
		top_description as string,
		clm_description as string,
		clm_source_system as string,
		top_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['pk_key_clm'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimClaimType
